name: KtPaperGui
description: A high level library for creating Paper plugins. Create advanced guis flawlessly with the kotlin dsl, with signals. Features commands, events, components, scoreboards, scheduling and more!

name: Iris
description: A scalable architecture for my Minecraft server, PvPHub. It allows for multiple backend servers to connect together seemlessly with a strong API to help make more advanced features!

name: Graphite
description: Web interface to view player's pvp stats, kits and more.

name: Playerkits
description: Private, high-level plugin for PvPHub compiled using KtPaperGui. Allows players to create kits with high customization and features.

name: Events
description: High level plugin for hosting in-game events. Extremely cutomizable, allowing any player to choose how the event runs and manage it along the way.

name: Portfolio
description: The website you're on now, created using plain HTML/CSS/JS. Have you found any little secrets yet?

name: ReconnectVelocity
description: Velocity plugin that saves the last connected server of your players and attempts to reconnect them when rejoining. Very extensive customization options.
